title: Webinar: Strengthening Private Sector Extension Advisory Services

tasks.task: Adapted Village Agent Model for Extension and Advisory Services
subtasks: Design market-driven approach involving exporter-supporting agents
Train village agents in 14 services, focusing on fruitful incentivization through commissions
Integrate existing tradelinks and expand logistics support via private sector input suppliers
Utilize ICT and video ammunition for efficient farmer outreach and training
Ensure trust and relationship building through behavioral change strategies
Facilitate access to finance for agents and traders through subsidies and partnerships

tasks.task: Strengthen Producer Organizations and Input Suppliers for Extension Ecosystem
subtasks: Foster farmer cooperatives that blend public and private sector extension roles
Align producer organizations with input suppliers for seamless service delivery
Enhance input suppliers' capacity in professionalism and quality assurance through technical assistance
Leverage ICT to reduce transaction costs and build robust communication networks

tasks.task: Leverage Digital Technologies for Extension Delivery and Services
subtasks: Implement customer relationship management (CRM) systems for data processing at farmer level
Develop WhatsApp-based communication platforms for market-driven extension services
Utilize open-source ComCare platforms for farmer-owned databases and real-time analytics
Integrate social media applications for efficient farmer outreach and service promotion

tasks.task: Strengthen Government-NGO-Farmer Partnerships for Sustained Extension Services
subtasks: Collaborate between Ministry of Agriculture, Trade, and Local Government to coordinate extension efforts
Certify village agents and support staff under national policies
Facilitate public-private partnerships through intermediary organizations like RTI International
Promote community-driven service delivery leveraging migrant local youth and digitization.
